parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
(a) a lot, (b) a portion assigned; hence: a portion of the people of God assigned to one's care, a congregation.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) a lot, (b) a portion assigned; hence: a portion of the people of God assigned to one's care, a congregation.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A reduplicated and contracted form of peto; probably akin to petomai through the idea of alighting; to fall.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Matthias. Apparently a shortened form of Mattathias; Matthias, an Israelite.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be voted or classed with. From sun and a compound of kata and psephizo; to count down in company with, i.e. Enroll among.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Eleven. From heis and deka; one and ten, i.e. Eleven.
From apostello; a delegate; specially, an ambassador of the Gospel; officially a commissioner of Christ.
